feed.title: Tresna Bali
feed.subtitle: Come experience authentic Balinese Cooking in the heart of Ubud!

entry.title: What is Babi Guling and its role in traditional Balinese ceremony?

link.title: What is Babi Guling and its role in traditional Balinese ceremony?

entry.content: Babi Guling is a prized ceremonial food, prepared for The Gods and Goddesses of our beloved island. Tourists flock to Ubud to try this...
entry.summary: Babi Guling is a prized ceremonial food, prepared for The Gods and Goddesses of our beloved island. Tourists flock to Ubud to try this...

entry.title: When you have lemons in Bali, you make an offering tower!

link.title: When you have lemons in Bali, you make an offering tower!

entry.content: For every Odalan at the big village temple, we have to make beautiful towers for the ceremonial procession.
entry.summary: For every Odalan at the big village temple, we have to make beautiful towers for the ceremonial procession.
